Name: CVO Firevault
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fruity yet slightly bitter. Orange predominates with strong bursts of bitter liqueur.
History: Discovered in 2005 at CVO Firevault in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of CVO Firevault contains 174 calories
